title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck
title_original: ECOWISH Women Valentine Heart Sweater V Neck Embroidery Knit Loose Casual Long Sleeve Ribbed Pullover Sweaters

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #12,287 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #198 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute with vibrant colors and appreciate its comfort, noting it's not itchy at all. They like its softness, fit, and quality, with one mentioning it's perfect for Valentine's Day events. The size receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others find it runs too big. The fabric quality also gets mixed reviews, with some praising the material while others report poor quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft nd pretty
items.body: Perfect fit, super comfortable to wear but I’m having a heck of a time to get the packaging wrinkles out. Hopefully the material will loosen up after. Yarn is lightweight and looks to be slightly brushed (thus the softness) let’s hope it doesn’t pill after wear. I’d recommend purchase Read more
items.author: Frances M. Nugent

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prepare for Compliments and Attention!
items.body: The colors are just as vibrant in person! Super cute and not itchy at all. Fabric is your typical sweater, not super cheap at all. The warmth is your average store sweater without being too heavy. I get tons of compliments when I wear it! Read more
items.author: ReadTheRoom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but, Big sweater
items.body: This is a great sweater. It looks just like the picture and it's Not itchy. However, it runs very large in my opinion. I'm usually medium but, it feels like an XL. Size down! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Darling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, well made sweater
items.body: I purchased this for my teen daughter and she loves it. It arrived vacuum packed and when I first took it out of the package, it was quite wrinkled. But after washing and drying, it came out perfectly. The sweater is very soft and is actually thicker and more substantial than it looks in the image. The fit is as expected - I ordered a size small and it hangs nicely on her; the style seems to be a loose fitting sweater with a generous v-neck to expose a shoulder! She is very happy with the sweater. Read more
items.author: Trying to be helpful

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: The sweater is cute enough for me to keep, but it is not as pictured. It is a simple, modest v-neck, not off the shoulder. I’m not even sure this is the same sweater as in the main item photos because the fabric doesn’t have that fluffy quality, it is completely smooth. Full of wrinkles, but I am hoping they come out in the dryer or with a low iron. It is true to size, so perhaps the models sized up like 3x so that it would fit very loosely. Read more
items.author: Mom of One

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase! Very happy!
items.body: Great sweater! I get so many compliments. High quality/well made! Fits well too! Read more
items.author: Julie S

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Falls apart in less than 24 hours.
items.body: Got the sweater yesterday and it is cute and comfortable. However in less than 24 hours of wearing it is falling apart. Multiple threads have come undone. I wore this sweater at home sitting at the computer so it's not from activity. Don't buy this! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars wrinkle caused when packing.
items.body: the sweater is adorable. looks like it is true to size. However i'm. concerned that when it was packed and air taken out for shipping. wrinkles in the very front of my sweater will still be there when i get ready to wear this sweater. I will be in contact with the company soon. Read more
items.author: KATHY MARTIN

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 386 Pink, 386 White Black, 3459 Pink, Black, 3459 Gray, Gray Blue, 3459 White, 386 White Wine, White, 386 Black, Beige, 3459 Rose Red, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
